
```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
nba <- read.csv("nbaNew.csv")
nba_clean<- select(nba, -(blanl), -(blank2))%>%
  na_if("")%>%
  filter(!row_number() %in% c(24625, 24626, 24627, 24628, 24628))
```

```{r}
nba_clean %>%
  filter(G > 0)%>%
  ggplot(aes(factor(Age),G)) +
  geom_boxplot()

```

```{r}
nba_clean %>%
  filter(FGA < 2500)%>%
  ggplot(aes(factor(Age),FGA)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
